dcterms:creator: D. R. Smith
O. Yurduseven
L. P. Mancera
P. Bowen
N. B. Kundtz
dcterms:description: A dataset containing analysis and modeling of a waveguide-fed metasurface antenna, focusing on the electromagnetic properties and performance characteristics of dynamic metasurface antennas (DMAs).
dcterms:title: Dynamic Metasurface Antennas (DMAs)

dcterms:creator: E. Björnson
L. Sanguinetti
H. Wymeersch
J. Hoydis
T. L. Marzetta
dcterms:description: A dataset that discusses the concept of holographic beamforming in massive MIMO systems, highlighting the potential and future directions for antenna arrays.
dcterms:title: Holographic Beamforming

dcterms:creator: S. Hu
F. Rusek
O. Edfors
dcterms:description: A dataset that explores the potential of data transmission using large intelligent surfaces, discussing the advantages over traditional massive MIMO systems.
dcterms:title: Large Intelligent Surfaces (LIS)

dcterms:creator: D. Dardari
dcterms:description: A dataset that provides fundamental limits and models for communicating with large intelligent surfaces, focusing on wireless channel characteristics.
dcterms:title: Wireless Channel Models

dcterms:creator: E. Björnson
L. Sanguinetti
dcterms:description: A dataset that presents a Rayleigh fading model and its implications for channel hardening in reconﬁgurable intelligent surfaces.
dcterms:title: Rayleigh Fading Model

dcterms:creator: D. M. Pozar
dcterms:description: A dataset containing empirical samples for propagation models, providing foundational data for microwave engineering.
dcterms:title: Empirical Samples for Propagation Models

dcterms:creator: W. Wasylkiwskyj
W. K. Kahn
dcterms:description: A dataset that discusses the theory of mutual coupling among minimum-scattering antennas, providing insights into antenna interactions.
dcterms:title: Mutual Coupling Analysis

dcterms:creator: R. Williams
P. Ramírez-Espinosa
J. Yuan
dcterms:description: A dataset containing simulation code for full-wave simulations of dynamic metasurface antennas, available on GitHub.
dcterms:title: Full-Wave Simulations
